trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [row v] to [] set [black cards total v] to [0] set [row number v] to [1] repeat (6) ask (join [Please enter 6 black or white cards for row ] (row number)) and wait set [row v] to (answer) set [index v] to [1] repeat (6) if <(letter (index) of (row)) = [B]> then change [black cards total v] by (1) end change [index v] by (1) end if <((black cards total) mod (2)) = [0]> then say (join (join [Row ] (row number)) [ is OK!]) for (2) secs else say (join [There is a parity error in row ] (row number)) for (2) secs end change [row number v] by (1) set [black cards total v] to [0] end
